001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.providers;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.spi.ConfigurationProvider;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.MissingNode;
008
009import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
010import java.lang.reflect.Method;
011import java.net.*;
012import java.util.Collections;
013
014public class CalculatedConfigurationProvider
015        implements ConfigurationProvider {
016
017    @Override
018    public String getNamespace() {
019        return "CALCULATED";
020    }
021
022    @Override
023    public JsonNode getJson(String name) {
024
025        try {
026            Method method = getClass().getMethod(name);
027
028            return (JsonNode) method.invoke(this);
029        } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
030            return MissingNode.getInstance();
031        } catch (InvocationTargetException | IllegalAccessException e) {
032            throw new RuntimeException(e);
033        }
034    }
035
036    public JsonNode hostName()
037    {
038        try {
039            return JsonNodeFactory.instance.textNode(InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostName());
040        } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
041            return MissingNode.getInstance();
042        }
043    }
044
045    public JsonNode ip() {
046
047        try {
048            return JsonNodeFactory.instance.textNode(InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostAddress());
049        } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
050            return MissingNode.getInstance();
051        }
052    }
053
054    public ArrayNode ipv4Addresses() {
055        ArrayNode addresses = JsonNodeFactory.instance.arrayNode();
056        try {
057            for (NetworkInterface netint : Collections.list(NetworkInterface.getNetworkInterfaces())) {
058                for (InetAddress inetAddress : Collections.list(netint.getInetAddresses())) {
059                    if (inetAddress instanceof Inet4Address)
060                        addresses.add(JsonNodeFactory.instance.textNode(inetAddress.getHostAddress()));
061                }
062            }
063            return addresses;
064        } catch (SocketException e) {
065            return addresses;
066        }
067    }
068
069    public ArrayNode ipv6Addresses() {
070        ArrayNode addresses = JsonNodeFactory.instance.arrayNode();
071        try {
072            for (NetworkInterface netint : Collections.list(NetworkInterface.getNetworkInterfaces())) {
073                for (InetAddress inetAddress : Collections.list(netint.getInetAddresses())) {
074                    if (inetAddress instanceof Inet6Address)
075                        addresses.add(JsonNodeFactory.instance.textNode(inetAddress.getHostAddress()));
076                }
077            }
078            return addresses;
079        } catch (SocketException e) {
080            return addresses;
081        }
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public String toString() {
086        return "Calculated configuration";
087    }
088}
